itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway break down Championship weekend in college football and give our final College Football Playoff Predictions,  Ross wins another monster parlay, why Michigan can't quit Jim Harbaugh, how the Seattle Seahawks have won 10 gam...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway break down Championship weekend in college football and give our final College Football Playoff Predictions,  Ross wins another monster parlay, why Michigan can't quit Jim Harbaugh, how the Seattle Seahawks have won 10 games by an average margin of 5.4 points a piece, why Ferguson vs Khabib is better than McGregor vs Cerrone in the UFC, the shocking firing of Ron Riviera, why Washington head coach Chris Peterson may have stepped down from Washington, as well as this week's NFL picks.
